DOC.brief_summary: In this trial the efficacy and safety of Mirena was investigated during the first year of use
DOC.brief_title: Mirena Efficiency and Tolerability During the First Year of Use
DOC.criteria: Women aged 25 to 39 years who sought effective contraception during the postpartum period (i.e. insertion of the device between 6 and 12 weeks after parturition). Standard exclusion criteria for use of intrauterine hormone devices
